page.title: 19RELIGIONS IN SALTBURN
page.content: There are{5 places of worship}in Saltburn. {Emmanuel Church}(Anglican) Founded in 1868. Vicar: Rev.D.Franks B.E.M.{ {Church Of Our Lady Of Lourdes}(Roman Catholic) Founded in 1929. Priest: Father Bluett. {Methodist Church}Founded in 1865. Minister: Rev. P.Watkinson.{ {Mission Church}(Evangelical) Founded recently. Pastor: Mr Donaldson. {Kingdom Hall}(Jehovah's Witness) Recent Foundation. The majority of Saltburn's population follow the {Anglican, Methodist or {Catholic}faiths.The {Anglican}church has the largest membership (310). A {Saltburn Council Of Churches}exists and ecumenical services are held at major festivals. Occasional open air services are held on Remembrance Day and in the Valley Gardens in Summer.
